title: PlayStation and Facebook Pull Out of GDC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.21.20
description:
Get started with your first month free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Blessing and Tim round out the week by discussing moore Coronavirus concerns, Hot Coffee returning and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:57 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:55 - PlayStation and Facebook cancel GDC appearances citing coronavirus concerns
00:12:20 - “Do you think it is more likely that the PS5 reveal is just a State of Play like livestream?” - Devante Chisolm
00:19:05 - NVIDIA Boasts Over One Million New Players Using GeForce NOW
00:22:58 - Microsoft Flight Simulator Will Include 'All Airports on Earth'
00:29:21 - Red Dead Redemption 2 has a Hot Coffee mod, and Take-Two wants it gone
00:34:04 - Out today
00:42:05 -  Hims
00:43:31 - Quip  
 Reader mail   -
00:44:39 - “Can we expect a new general Direct before the end of March?” - Suck Sandwich
00:51:52 - “Review Bombing.” - Frank Furtter
00:58:32 - Squad Up: Ryland Prince - PS4 - Rylandprince
00:59:00 - You‘re Wrong
01:02:17 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Blessing
Tuesday - Blessing & Imran
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Blessing & Tim
Friday - Greg & Blessing
